statements: UPDATE geolocation_info SET latitude = 39.123456, longitude = -76.654321, challenge_name = 'Challenge 1', challenge_description = 'Test description 1' WHERE location_id = 1;
UPDATE geolocation_info SET challenge_name = 'Challenge 2', latitude = 40.987654, challenge_description = 'Another test description', longitude = -73.123456 WHERE location_id = 2;
UPDATE geolocation_info SET latitude = -34.453, longitude = 150.876, challenge_name = 'Beach Cleanup' WHERE location_id = 1;
UPDATE geolocation_info SET challenge_description = 'Hiking trail cleanup on the weekend', challenge_name = 'Trail Cleanup' WHERE location_id = 2;
UPDATE geolocation_data SET latitude = 40.7128, longitude = -74.0060 WHERE location_id = 1;
UPDATE challenge_data SET location_id = 1, challenge_name = 'New Challenge Name' WHERE challenge_id = 2;
UPDATE geolocation_data SET latitude = 38.8977, longitude = -77.0365 WHERE location_id = 1;
UPDATE challenge_data SET challenge_name = 'New Challenge Name' WHERE challenge_id = 5;
UPDATE Challenges SET location_lat = 40.7128, location_long = -74.0060 WHERE challenge_id = 1;
UPDATE Participants SET participant_name = 'Alice' WHERE participant_id = 3;
UPDATE Challenges SET location_lat = 40.7128, location_long = -74.0060 WHERE challenge_id = 1;
UPDATE Participants SET participant_name = 'Alice' WHERE participant_id = 1;
UPDATE challenge_locations SET location_name = 'Updated Location 1' WHERE location_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE players SET email = 'updated_email@example.com' WHERE player_id = 'abcdef12-3456-7890-cdef-123456abcdef';
UPDATE challenges SET difficulty = 'Medium' WHERE challenge_name = 'Hiking Challenge';
UPDATE player_progress SET completion_status = TRUE, points = points + 10 WHERE player_id = 'a1b2c3d4-1234-5678-9012-abcdef123456' AND challenge_id = '9876fedc-4321-8765-2109-abcd09876543';
UPDATE challenges SET challenge_name='New Challenge Name' WHERE challenge_id=1;
UPDATE users SET last_login=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, username='New Username' WHERE user_id=2;
UPDATE challenges SET time_limit = '01:30:00' WHERE challenge_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET last_login = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, username = 'new_user' WHERE user_id = 5;
